duties_responsibilities.duty: Handle client account bank reconciliation, premium reconciliation, and client funding functions.
Organize and enter payables, prepare billing setups and monthly invoicing.
Process client account bank and premium reconciliations and resolve discrepancy dollars.
Responsible for stop pay and check tracers, transmit positive pay files.
Identify client premium and cobra refunds due and prepare refund documentation for check run.
Analyze and process unclaimed properties and taxes in accordance with individual state’s escheatment/claim tax requirements.
Deposit checks into respective bank accounts, process bank and vendor set-up forms.
Apply premiums to subscribers and resolve discrepancy dollars in premium reconciliation duties.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED, with 3+ hours of college courses in a related field of accounting or finance preferred.
